content.prompt: Which of the following best describes the condition of guest workers in post-Second World War Europe?

choices.label: They were given little opportunity to achieve citizenship in many host countries.
They were integrated into the host country's society.
They were employed on short-term contracts for highly skilled technical jobs.
They were concentrated in the well-paid service sector.
They were invited to Europe as part of the decolonization process.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
